thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Debra

author: Debra
title: Debra
text: I am so glad that I found Thriftbooks.com. My favorite past time is reading. I do have an e-reader but I love to have a solid book in hand also. I am collecting books from favorite Authors, that I read over and over. Thank you Thriftbooks.com for an awesome site and excellent customer service. I live on a budget and Thriftbooks.com fits right into my budget. Happy reading everyone. ðŸ“šðŸ˜€
